an expert in numerology (= the study of numbers in the belief that they have a special importance in people's lives): Throughout history there have been patterns to thrill the numerologist. The numerologist speculated on the correlation of the date, September 11, with the national dialling code for emergencies: 911.
More examplesFewer examplesJohn didn't turn up because Yoko's numerologist said the numbers weren't good.Numerologist and astrologer Karyl Jackson knows lots of people who base all their major decisions on numbers and dates and the positions of the planets and stars.It does not require a numerologist versed in the mysteries of Madonna's beloved Kabbalah to decipher the significance of these numbers.
